Wednesday night. Courtney Lee started for New York despite the death of his grandfather, Allen Iverson Desmond Courtney Lee , who was 92 when he passed away on Tuesday night. ''I choose to judge him by the work he has done for me for the government and for the country. He has run the Downing Street press office in a very straightforward, professional and competent way.
